title: MADE Bike Show Announces New Venue, Opens Ticket Sales
content:
With a stacked exhibitor list and growing excitement from the custom framebuilding crowed and boutique brands, the MADE Bike Show has moved to Portland’s Zidelll Yards to give them more space.

Created as a way to “spotlight framebuilders, domestic production, and artisan craftsmanship”, the show has quickly attracted many of the top builders and brands in the space (200+ and counting), with plenty of component and lifestyle brands filling the booths between bike builders.

Show dates are August 25-27, 2023, and tickets are on sale now for $20. They’re also hosting an industry and media day preceding the consumer hours, giving the builders a chance to hang out and catch up before things get busy.

Check the full list of exhibitors and get more details at Made.bike.

The post MADE Bike Show Announces New Venue, Opens Ticket Sales appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
